content: hey gaming friends I got to visit my daughter last weekend and we do play
online we do play role-playing games online but
we got I get to run a special game for her
I see RPG game which is cankered Fornells homebrew crazy man system light
story-driven system and i got to run it for them and they had a blast we had a
lot of fun well the craft I have for you today is
basically taken from hankerings book but I want to show you ahead a little a few
little embellishments on it and it might help to for you to see the process as
opposed to being told if you're not familiar of it but what I did if the
game was I just had the characters pick their little Sandy on the paper stand
easy that hanker does a great straight sheets
of these little little sandy characters paper sandy characters I had to pick
their own kick their character sandy and make it right at the table and only took
a few minutes to do so let me hit the table and I'll show you just how easy it
is to make these little Sandy's for the icy RPG so take care and we'll hit the
table and see how easy that is alright here's a set of standings that
hankerin makes and they're just fantastic I love his artwork so cool he
has such a great style alright now I'm gonna cut out a stand D for my character
and just easy easy peasy just pick it cut it out bend it over and I'll just
use a popsicle stick and this will be for strength and I'll just bend that
over glue it to the popsicle stick and one thing I like to do is I like to cut
out the edge because I don't like the square looking token so I kind of cut
out the edge then just snip it and I'm using a pathfinder pond base and just
perfect ready to go for game now as a DM I was running the red sword and I had
this big beastie in the game okay bridge sword is a scenario from his warp shell
campaign so I'm just I needed this big beastie but I wanted some more strength
for this instead of just one stick right so here's what I did
so I used a one stick first lined it up another make sure it's on the main body
of the beastie and then I had this stick for the tentacle that's coming off the
thing so it would just be wobbling around and I'll just glue that around
bend it over nice just make sure it's secure on the popsicle sticks and then
like the others I like to cut out the edge I don't like the square look so it
just couldn't be easier and I did all this while the players were making their
characters I just made all the monsters while the players were doing their
characters took it's just a couple minutes put on the big base and you are
ready to I see RPG game yeah hey gamers I highly recommend you check out the
index card RPG and it's on Drive Thru RPG you just look under rune
hammer games and you can get the corset with a bunch of extras as well as the

use and yeah check that out get the stuff I also check out
